alert.note: Alert for Fannin; Gilmer; Murray (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 29 at 4:05AM EDT until August 29 at 10:15AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Central Fannin County in north central Georgia... Northwestern Gilmer County in north central Georgia... Southeastern Murray County in northwestern Georgia... * Until 1015 AM EDT Tuesday. * At 405 AM EDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Ellijay, Blue Ridge, East Ellijay, Mountaintown, Cherry Log, Tails Creek and Roundtop. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
